titleStmt.title: A vindication of the divine perfections illustrating the glory of God in them, by reason and revelation: methodically digested into several meditations. By a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Stair, James Dalrymple, Viscount of, 1619-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.D. for Brabazon Aylmer, at the Three Pigeons in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: With an advertisement at the foot of p. 356.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
